name: Name Thine Faite
description:
All these silly systems (Dialogue, A* Pathfinding, world generation, etc) are mine, which came at a bit of a cost as you can see lol. There are some things to interact with, but no real action... yet! (Still updating)

tl;dr - there's not much to do right now except interact with things, working on updates!

------

The world, the characters, your personality - it's all generated by your choices. Yep, even your name is  a choice.

So how about it? Name your faite! :D

Note: There is zero RNG or PRNG in this project, created for the Chance Mini-Jam with the no-RNG limitation. Didn't quite finish, but either way it was a neat little experiment to do and I hope you enjoy it!

------

Spoilers for names, here!

Any name with 'lu' in it gets a werewolf stat.
'fa' = foxchild stat
'yr' = vampire stat
& one mystery stat that I'm just not tellin'. ;)
